contextId.information: The UDB makes clear that it was Paul who wrote this letter. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy to the church

contextId.information: Paul is referring to preaching the gospel message. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
It is understood that this refers to faith in Christ. This can be made explicit. AT: "a good report of your faith"  (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the good news of your faith

contextId.information: This refers to faith in Christ. This can be made explicit. AT: "because of your faith in Christ" (See [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
This can be made explicit. AT: "the Lord will punish the one who transgressed and will defend the one who was wronged" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
The "dead in Christ" are those believers who have passed away. AT: "those who believe in Jesus Christ, but who have already died, will rise first" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the dead in Christ will rise first
